A Universal Ontology for Sensor Networks Data
Mohamad Eid1, Ramiro Liscano2, Abdulmotaleb El Saddik, Multimedia Communications Research Laboratory - MCRLab School of Information Technology and Engineering - University of Ottawa Ottawa, Ontario, K1N 6N5, Canada
1{eid, abed} @ mcrlab.uottawa.ca, 2Ramiro.Liscano@uoit.ca
[1]
An Ontology-Based Sensor Network Prototype Environment
.  Caleb Goodwin and David J. Russomanno
[2]
An Ontology-Based Approach to Sensor-Mission Assignment
Alun Preece, Mario Gomez, Geeth de Mel, Wamberto Vasconcelos and Derek Sleeman
[3]
Building a Sensor Ontology: A Practical Approach Leveraging ISO and OGC Models
, David J. Russomanno, Cartik R. Kothari and Omoju A. Thomas Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering The University of Memphis Memphis, TN 38152 USA
[4]
Building a Service-Oriented Ontology forWireless Sensor Networks
Jeong-Hee Kim, Hoon Kwon, Do-Hyeun Kim, Ho-Young Kwak, Sang-Joon Lee
[5]
Ontology Driven Adaptive Data Processing In Wireless Sensor Networks
. Yuheng Hu, Zhendong Wu and Ming Guo
[6]
Ontology-driven Adaptive Sensor Networks
. Sasikanth Avancha, Chintan Patel, Anupam Joshi.
[7]
Ontology for Level-One Sensor Fusion and Knowledge Discovery
Marion G. Ceruti
